section.title: Understanding alertsAE_alerts_home_page
section.para: Alerts let you know about important events that occur in your environment. The alert details and severity level help you decide what course of action to take.

Alerts can be triggered by a single event or multiple events. Events that trigger alerts fall into one of several categories, from security issues to business conditions. For example, alerts are generated when high-risk user behavior is detected or a subscription is about to expire.
